allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add Git workflow, CLAUDE.md, and all fork modifications

- Added CLAUDE.md with build commands, architecture, and Git workflow
- Added AGENTS.md with coding guidelines and patch notes protocol
- Added PatchNotes.md to track change history
- Updated GUI: single window UI, embedded radar, health bars, ESP improvements
- Added aimbot features: trajectory prediction, random bone selection
- Added entity naming system with boss/raider/guard recognition
- Fixed DMA thread crash on raid exit, improved discovery retry
- Updated dependencies: ImGui, MemProcFS, libcurl, sqlite, nanosvg
- Added ballistics, firearm manager, loot filter systems

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
